website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind paying a higher price, these yoga pants are attractive, supportive, and ideal for situations that require a heavier material.
pros: Attracts active individuals with its exceptional material that has a thick feel and stylish looks that some customers say make them practical to wear as regular pants
cons: May be a bit long on petite individuals
Material is warm, and not ideal in warm climates or rooms

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: These pants are the bomb! Comfy, well fitted. Great waist line band. I have them in two colors. I do wish I would have gotten the petite length instead of regular ( I'm 5'5" ) so they are a bit long but no big deal...cuz I love these pants!!! They are just right for the thickness so nothing shows that shouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and thick The regular is still pretty long Had them hemmed and are
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and thick The regular is still pretty long Had them hemmed and are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Price

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants! Very slimming and good support for a pregnant belly. Loved the first pair so much I bought a 2nd the day after I got the 1st ones. I'm nearing the end of my pregnancy, but the all over support from these pants makes me feel less pregnant and more like myself in my own body. I'll enjoy them as much after I deliver too, will need the support with post-baby body as well. Really love these pants. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mila0098

customer_reviews.title: A good pant for the colder months
customer_reviews.text: The material is a bit heavy. A good pant for the colder months. Very comfortable. Washes well. Can be dressed up or down. Great with tunic tops or for workout pants. A little pricey, but these will last a long time. You get what you pay for. Prana means quality.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Don't dry these in the dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Ordered a M and they fit great. Very soft, smooth fabric. Don't dry them in the dryer!!!
customer_reviews.author: missanna

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Yoga pant
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pant on recommendations of yoga friends. I am do glad I did. I am looking forward to doing yoga in comfort! Planning on buying the "Audrey" in lots of colors.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Best pants ever
customer_reviews.text: My go to pants! The last pair I had lasted 3 years with maximum wear and they still look great. I just bought another pair because I lost the other one. Same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Om

customer_reviews.title: Great pants for everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Perfect yoga and all-around town pants. Great fit, quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia I. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Pants
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, super comfy. If they were cheaper I'd buy several pair! These are great weekend/around the house pants too.
customer_reviews.author: Karri Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, very flattering. Could even pass as slacks at work!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: These yoga pants are so well made and styled like slacks, I wear them every week to the ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying these pants in a local store, I bought 3 more from Amazon at a price that is less than half per pair of pants then my original purchase. These yoga pants are so well made and styled like slacks, I wear them every week to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: This brand is one of the best for fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one of the best for fit and quality. I am not a small person, 5'5", 170 pounds and the large are perfect for me. Anything I but from Amazon has great shipping times and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D. Eaton

product_meta.title: prAna Women's Regular Inseam Audrey Pant
product_meta.description:
An amazing fit and feel is why customers have made the Audrey pant their go-to for all activities. Classically designed with a mid rise and boot legs, and includes a wide waistband for a supportive, no-slip fit. Our Chakara performance knit provided enhanced durability for years of non-stop wear. As an official Blue sign design, no harmful products were used in its CREATION.

Standard fit, standard rise, and uncommon excellence are brought to you by Chakara fabric in our best do-it-all pant.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Tonal self inset detail at waistband
